item.description:
@deshanoa wrote:

I need help adding commands

this is the command im putting in

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Bankall")) { for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); c.sendMessage("You deposit all your items to the bank"); } } }

Compiling errorsâ€¦

and where im adding it at the very end.
